overview: When Nelly discovers her lover is a serial cheater she loses herself in a subverted emotional frenzy. Having never been with another woman, she now wants to taste the mistress who caused her lovers infidelity.  Having breathed a fresh scent she suddenly finds a new inner-self, and a new hot-blooded sexuality as she becomes the adulterer. Lost in a succession of affairs the two women are driven apart by desires and passions neither can understand nor control.  Unfaithful 3 shows genuine and fully-explicit lesbian sex as itâ€™s never been seen before. Erotic and very graphic, this is true lesbian erotica at the highest level.
title: Unfaithful 3
